tool_description: Parses and analyzes document content structure, extracting text, identifying form fields, and locating potential signature areas for signing preparation.

document_path.description: Path to the document to parse

error_messages: Parse error: Unable to parse document content due to format restrictions or corruption.
Protected document: Document is password-protected or encrypted and cannot be parsed.
Content extraction failed: Text or form extraction failed due to document structure issues.
usage: Specify document_path and configure parsing options using boolean flags. Returns structured content data including text, forms, and layout information.

form_fields.description: Identified form field names and types
